page.title: 06HOUSING IN CALDER VALE
page.content:
{Detatched houses:} There are a number of detatched houses in the area and these are of many varied styles. Some, like 'Burnside' were built by the mill owners in the nineteenth century, whilst others date from the early twentieth century or later.
Bleasdale Tower situated in the NW corner of the block lies in the centre of its own private estate, surrounded by extensive woodlands and tenented farms.
{Bungalows:} On Strickens Lane there are a number of small bungalows which were built in the inter war period as holiday homes. They command extensive views towards the coast. Over the years they have been bought and lived in permanently by local people.
